page.title: 10Bayford Publican/His Trade
page.content: The Bakers Arms is a popular country pub, part of the{McMullen Brewery. This local firm is based in Hertford. The pub employs 14 staff, including the boy who "bottles up". The pub only sells traditional ales, and the most popular beer is 'AK'. The sale of{'Pub Grub'}has become increasingly important, and food such as Steak and Kidney Pie, and chips; and, a 'special' three times a week are served. Customers are fairly evenly divided between locals and outsiders.{Sunday {lunchtime is the busiest period,}and families are attracted by the garden. Social events such as barbeques are organised, as are inter-pub darts, crib, and dominoes. As to the future, the publican would like{more flexible opening hours, according to public demand in the area
